title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CLI and Go library to pull, create, and run LLMs locally with a built-in model registry (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.).

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno, and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, generator streaming, and Pydantic helpers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, and structured output.

title: ollama-webui (now Open WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat history, RAG, user roles, and OpenAI API compatibility.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers sync/async APIs, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby features and streaming support.

title: ollamaclient
summary: Minimal Rust crate for chatting with Ollama via HTTP with Tokio and serde.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL for Ollama written in Go with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack by deepset integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama with Docker, Kubernetes, GPU acceleration, and cloud providers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent storage.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama with async HTTP, streams, and optional JSON marshalling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with Open WebUI, GPU support, and optional NVIDIA runtime.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration letting developers inject Ollama clients as beans with YAML config.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-operator
summary: Kubernetes operator to declaratively deploy Ollama models as custom resources with auto-updates.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Qt6 and C++; supports chat, model management, and dark mode.
